Github Pages Template

A simple, customizable, and scalable Github Pages template

View on Github Download Zip

About

Welcome to a brand new Github Pages Template! Start building your new website here. This project was created to help kick-start other projcts you're working on. If you need documentation for or want to showcase a seperate project you can freely use this template to get started!

Features

This project comes with a complete build pipeline out of the box. That means you can run development and production builds after making changes in your development environment.

Development

This project comes with Node, NPM, Gulp, jQuery, Bootstrap, and SASS out of the box. All of these technologies are included using NPM and are incorperated into your Gulp build pipeline. All you have to do is start building.
